content: introducing the bbb the basic bulky beanie sized to fit from preemies to adult large the bbb is the perfect crochet beanie pattern for you to use for all your crochet caps this pattern is available in two lengths mid ear and base of earlobe making it suitable for chemo hats and preemie caps as well as for regular hat embellishments the adult large size takes less than 1 ball of red heart soft essentials and works up in less than 1 hour have fun crocheting and as always message me with any questions comments or concerns ♥ rhondda
